bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Postcard from the U.S. Government Printing Office to Philip Showalter Hench, February 28, [1941]

div1.p: The U.S. Government Printing Office acknowledges receipt of Hench's order. The publication requested is currently out-of-stock.

div1.head: Postcard from the U.S. Government Printing Office to Philip Showalter Hench, February 28, [1941]

opener.dateline:
UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE
DIVISION OF PUBLIC DOCUMENTS
WASHINGTON, D. C.
FEB 28 1941

div1.p:
This will acknowledge receipt of your order of Feb. 26
No. 221125 A with remittance, but as stock is not immediately
available there will be some delay. Every effort will be made to com-
plete your order before returning your remittance.
div1.closer:
Respectfully, SUPERINTENDENT OF DOCUMENTS. 16--8606
Form SD-133
